name: sigma-app
description: Sails & Angular App with separated back-end API and frontend.

scripts.install: cd api/ && npm install && cd ../dist && npm install
scripts.start: (cd api && node app.js) & (cd dist && node index.js)
scripts.load: cd api && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && grunt build && cd ../ && git submodule update --init --recursive dist && cd dist/ && npm install
scripts.postload: (cd api && node app.js) & (cd dist && node index.js)

author: DLFinis
